availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Ham (Allen County, Kentucky, farm laborer, clerk, merchant.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farm laborer, clerk, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of James Ham and E. Ham. Married to Caroline Ray Ham in Allen County, Kentucky, on December 29, 1863. Farm laborer in Allen County in 1850. Clerk in Allen County in 1860. Merchant in Allen County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 166A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 364.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 56.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Allen County, KY, February 1864, p. 162.
"J.W. Ham (1832-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #35711114 , accessed August 11, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35711114 .
